NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
LAEVI: Lami, I ask as your big brother: Please, use the <color=orange>Artificial Gravity Highway</color> normally. We have already played this game enough times!
2
1
LAMI: Not yet, Laevi! I won't give up on this game, not until I jump higher than you!
3
1
LAMI: Just watch, Laevi: I'm going to jump from the bottom of the <color=orange>Artificial Gravity Highway</color> all the way to the highest district, in one go!
4
3
LAMI: Aw, that jump was so weak.. I just can't figure it out! Why can't I jump as high as you did earlier, Laevi?
5
4
LAEVI: If you wish to learn how to jump to greater heights, then I suggest we travel to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> without delay!
6
4
LAEVI: That is because we're on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow's</color> north pole now, Lami..
BH_H EX1 1
BH_H EX6 6
